DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 30 ≤ 70 year balance gender ratio ( 50 : 50 ) BMI 2025 kg/m² ( normal weight subject ) BMI 2535 kg/m² ( obese subject ) acute illness within last 2 week examination autoimmune diseases disorder immune compromise ( leukocytes < 5000/μl ) renal insufficiency ( creatinine > 1.5 mg / dl ) heart disease , condition heart attack anemia ( Hb < 12 g / l , control examination ) , blood donation within 4 week examination participation another study within 2 month examination wear metal magnetic object body claustrophobia use immunomodulatory drug ( cortisol , antihistamine , aspirin ) thyroid disease take glitazones insulin therapy pregnancy , lactation , menstruation cigarette smoking , use alcohol drug , psychiatric disorder risk / manifest AIDS ( HIV ) hepatitis B C liver disease attribute existence nonalcoholic steatosis night shift work circumstance , allow normal daynight rhythm bleed disorder disorder wind heal hypersensitivity local anesthetic malignant cancer
